gen:link.label:label: BV236: The sum of the values reported for "Assets listing" for the three different categories reported in the template S.06.01 - Summary of assets, should be equal to the sum of the values reported in the same template "By category" for the sixteen different categories. -->Template 1: S.06.01; Columns: c0010;0020;0030;0040;0050;0060; Expression: {r0010}+{r0020}+{r0030}={r0040}+{r0050}+{r0060}+{r0070}+{r0080}+{r0090}+{r0100}+{r0110}+{r0120}+{r0130}+{r0140}+{r0150}+{r0160}+{r0170}+{r0180}+{r0190}

BV236: The sum of the values reported for "Assets listing" for the three different categories reported in the template S.06.01 - Summary of assets, should be equal to the sum of the values reported in the same template "By category" for the sixteen different categories. -->Template 1: S.06.01; Columns: c0010;0020;0030;0040;0050;0060; Expression: {r0010}+{r0020}+{r0030}={r0040}+{r0050}+{r0060}+{r0070}+{r0080}+{r0090}+{r0100}+{r0110}+{r0120}+{r0130}+{r0140}+{r0150}+{r0160}+{r0170}+{r0180}+{r0190}
